name: Amandustechnologies
overview: We are professional software testing engineers with Avg. 10+ years of software testing experience in managing release of world class products. List of common reasons why Testing and Release projects to be granted to us: # Lower costs due to economies of scale. # Ability to concentrate on core functions. # Higher quality service due to focus on software testing by Testing Associates. # Improved internal management disciplines resulting from the exercise itself. # Less dependency upon internal resources. # Control of budget. # Faster setup of the function or service. # Lower ongoing investment required in internal infrastructure. # Increase flexibility to meet changing business conditions. # Purchase of industry best practice.
